historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 47-3221.

1973 Ed., § 47-3113.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-58, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-3201.

For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-142, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-3201.

Miscellaneous Notes

Pub.L. 105-227, § 2, Aug. 12, 1998, 112 Stat. 1515, provides:

"Notwithstanding section 602(c)(1) of the District of Columbia Home Rule Act, the Washington Convention Center Authority Financing Amendment Act of 1998 (D.C. 12-402) shall take effect on the date of the enactment of this Act."

DC CODE § 47-3221
